languages.text: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
languages.original_text: Проверки, совершаемые повторно под действием стратагемы: ликвидация, проходят со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15.

traits.locale_text: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a -15 penalty.

languages.text: 当绝境战略中的敌人受到战略能力影响，重新进行检定时，检定效果会承受−15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当绝境战略中的敌人受到战略影响，重新检定时，检定效果会承受-15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: Las pruebas que deban repetirse por el efecto de Estratagema de zona de eliminación se realizan con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −15.
languages.original_text: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Las pruebas que deban repetirse por el efecto de Estratagema de zona de eliminación se realizan con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −15.

languages.text: Vom Killzone-Strategem erzwungene Wiederholungen sind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −15 versehen.
languages.original_text: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Vom Killzone-Strategem erzwungene Wiederholungen sind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −15 versehen.

languages.text: Les nouveaux tests imposés par le Stratagème Zone de Destruction s'accompagnent d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −15.
languages.original_text: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les nouveaux tests imposés par le Stratagème Zone de Destruction s'accompagnent d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -15.

languages.text: キルゾーン計略による再判定で−15の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を付与する。
languages.original_text: Re-rolls forced by Killzone Stratagem are made with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: キルゾーン計略による再判定で-15の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を付与する。
